forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers this morning with overcast skies during the afternoon hours. High around 15C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 59F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 44F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High around 15C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High around 60F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 9C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 49F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low 6C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low 43F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers for the afternoon. High 13C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with showers for the afternoon hours. High near 55F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of light rain. Low 46F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 57F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 8C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 47F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 57F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy with occasional rain...mainly in the evening. Low 6C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain ending early. Then remaining mainly cloudy. Low 42F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High near 15C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 58F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with a few showers. Low 44F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Monday

forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with showers at times. High near 60F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 46F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High near 15C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 59F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
